entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `System.Text.Ascii.Trim`/`TrimStart`/`TrimEnd` methods include `'\0'` character/byte in trimming #104201
  • [mono] Support copying arrays of compatible pointers #104197
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104185

Closed

  • Add a SUPPORT.MD #103936
  • Produce Single File: app crashing #103552
  • Does anyone know what was accomplished in comment https://github.com/dotnet/core/issues/7556#issuecomment-1786377918 #104186
  • [mono][tvos] Failure in System.Memory.Tests.Span.StringSearchValuesTests.SimpleIndexOfAnyValues #101367
  • Update dogfooding page for .NET 9 #104088
  • Test failure: System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests.AttackTests.ArraysOfStringsAreNotBeingPreAllocated #103550
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Test build failing because of ShiftLeftLogical/ShiftRightLogical #104190
  • Object Header or Sync Block in BotR: Threading - Synchronization: Managed #79248
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: string.{Last}IndexOfAny(string[]) #100724
  • [API Proposal]: Add IndexOfAny string[] overloads #98106
  • [API Proposal]: Async overloads of `Console.Write[Line]` #104182
  • [API Proposal]: string.Create Span overload #58691
    Future
  • API proposal: bitwise operations on Span(of byte) buffers #26651
    Future
  • ApiProposal: string.Create method which takes an additional Span as data parameter #25898
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Use resumable leaf frames in CET hijack and in GC stress. #104198
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Dispose handles when inheritabilty is requested and O_CLOEXEC flag can't be set #104196
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Delete unnecessary StructLayout attribute in TagList.netcore.cs #104193
    needs-area-label
  • Enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #104192
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added four SVE `CreateBreak*` APIs #104184
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve

Merged

  • Link to general support page from repo readme #104188
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • Check the VL in bytes instead of bits #104191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace net8 with net9 under docs #104189
    area-Meta
  • increase the allocation threshold for tests that need to ensure that 2GB+ does not get pre-allocated #104151
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToint64` and `ConvertToUInt64` #104069
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs `CreateMaskForFirstActiveElement` and `CreateMaskForNextActiveElement` #104002
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix mistake in BotR Threading section #104183
    area-System.Threading

Updated

  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • Optimize VectorT.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete X509Certificate{2} constructors and X509Certificate2Collection.Import #104165
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • Fix static-lib AOT Mono builds #103988
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Print linking instructions for NativeLib=static #103960
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Get rid of fluent assertions in System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests #104166
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization
  • [coreclr] Remove CatchHardwareExceptionHolder #104121
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Part-2:Add runtime assembly code (*.S) files in nativeaot. #104084
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • Centralize the folding logic for ConditionalSelect and ensure side effects aren't dropped #104175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2484961 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
